spk lec 1.html.title: Lecture 1
spk lec 1.html.body:
Lecture 1
FC : Fluency and Coherence
1. Length: williningness to talk        (Fluency)

part 1: personal question
​    2-3 sentences    20-30 words



part 2 :


part 3 :


2. Pause        (Fluency)
- fillers

er / em        ( 少說呀，別天天掛嘴上 )
well / you know / I mean / maybe / perhaps / I guess (I’m not sure) / like / kind of / sort of
Actually / in fact / to be honest
let me see / what I want to say is 
I don't know (maybe)


- Language hesitation

What's the word? / what's it called?
Sorry I forgot the word.
Anyway, it's like + description.
It doesn't matter, anyway...


- content hesitation

It's a tough one, let me think about it.
To be honest, I've never thought about this before.


3. Connectives (connecting words)        (Coherence)
有較強的邏輯關係    （教材 PP. 120）

轉折 / 遞進 （並列） / 因果 / 讓步 ...


4. Discourse markers ( 語篇標記 )        (Coherence)

This is to say / In other words ...
The first thing that comes to mind ...
fillers    ( 見前面 )



LR : Lexial Resource
topic-related vocabulary
1. LESS COMMON        不常見的表達、用詞
程度是對於 language learners    (humblebrag    凡爾賽)


https://idioms.thefreedictionary.com/
https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/
E.g. 替換
    dog - puppy
    dog - teddy dog / corgi / husky / golden retriever
​    cat - kitten / kitty
​    cat - British Shorthair / Ragboll cat
​            delicious - tasty / appetizing
​            food - meal / snack / cuisine
​                    e.g. flower cake with rose jam
​                        fried potatoes with chilli oil / sauce
​            good weather
​                wonderful climate
​                mild temperature    ( never too cold or too hot )

2. Paraphrase
常見同義替換
like - enjoy / love / admire / adore
​         be fond of / be keen on / be really into / be a big fan of
​        prefer - would choose (to do) / pick / go for 
​        important - critical / crucial / necessary / essential / vital

3. Collocation    (固定搭配)
decent    得體的 adj.
— decent weather / wage / behaviour / education

4. idiomatic items （習語）
— You know, like people always say, ...
YOLO : You Only Live Once
OOTD : Outfit of the day            — outfit: 穿搭
blood is thicker than water    血溶於水
Run in the blood
​        hot knife through butter 🧈     (快刀斬亂麻，形容 輕鬆 啥的)
​        like the kettle said to the pot     （五十步笑百步；半斤八兩）
​        the pot calling the kettle black
be going to do : be gonna do
​    i’m gonna talk about…...
what are u = whatcha
want to = wanna
do you 发音 ： jiu
what do 发音 ： whajiu
Have / has = ‘ve got    /    ’s got
​    i have a question = i’ve got a question
​    she has a house = she’s got a house
don’t have / doesn’t have = haven’t got / hasn’t got
do you have… / does he have… ? = have you got... / has he got...    
Have to / has to = ‘ve got to    /    ’s got to    =    gotta
i have to go    =    i’ve got to go    =    i gotta go.
He has to leave my house    =    he’s got to leave my house    =    he’s gotta to leave my house


GRA : Grammatical Range and Accuracy
1.  Range    (less common)
句型 （簡單句 / 並列句 / 複合句）
時態（完成時 / 過去將來 / 虛擬語氣）
句式（被動 / 倒裝）

2. Accuracy


PRON : Pronunciation
1. individual (word) pronunciation

元音
Bad /bæd/            bed /bed/
Sheep /ʃiːp/            ship /ʃɪp/
Beach /biːtʃ/            bitch /bitʃ/
heat /hɪːt/            hit /hɪt/
main rain train        /ein/
When ten        類似 萬（壓扁） 探（壓扁）



輔音
green    ‘g’ 和 ‘r’ 之間不要加音
blue    ‘b’ 和 ‘l’ 之間不加音



重音    ( 名前    動後 )    (倒數第三個)
teenager    /t'eenager/
Pho'/to/graph    pho/'to/gra/phy    pho/'to/gra/pher
Na/tio/nal    na/tio/na/li/ty
Per/so/nal    per/so/na/lity



濁化
s or x     (/s/)    後跟 /p/ 濁化成    /b/
​    splendid    expenditure  (開銷)


  /t/ 濁化成 /d/
  ​    stunning    extent
  /k/ 濁化成 /g/
  ​    sky    score    square
  ​    excuse    exquisite

2. Pronunciation features
連讀 / 失去爆破 / 音調 （ intonation    /    sentence stress ）
content words 實詞
function words 虛詞


Summary in Today
what do you like most about your hometown?
it’s gotta be the tasty local snacks and cuisine. You know, we’ve got different kinds of rice noodles. And we’ve also got flower cakes with rose jam, fried potatoes with chilli oil and something like that.
it’s gotta be the wonderful climate. you know, we’ve got mild temperature all year around, I mean, it’s never too cold or too hot.
